title: A critical role for iron and zinc homeostatic systems in the evolutionary adaptation of
authors: Paterson JR, Wadsworth JM, Hu P, Sharples GJ
abstract: Host nutritional immunity utilizes metal deprivation to help prevent microbial infection. To investigate bacterial adaptation to such restrictive conditions, we conducted experimental evolution with two metal sequestering agents.
